scripts.build: node build.mjs && mkdirp dist && j2w -i build/bundle.js --initLocation http://seance-backend-spin.localhost -o dist/seance-backend-spin.wasm
scripts.build:debug: node build.mjs && mkdirp dist && j2w -d -i build/bundle.js --initLocation http://seance-backend-spin.localhost -o dist/seance-backend-spin.wasm
